page.title: 04FURTHER EDUCATION-S.CREAKE
page.content: There nare no facilities within the block for education of the 11+ group, the majority who travel daily by bus to the Comprehensive School at Wells-next-the-Sea some 6 miles from the village. A sixth-form centre for A-level studies is available at Fakenham High School, again 6 miles away, and a daily bus is provided. The Norfolk College of Arts & Technology at Kings Lynn (22 miles distant) offers a wide range of further education opportunities, and training in practical skills for the 16+ age group. Students are collected by bus from the village. A varied selection of evening classes is available at the above mentioned centres, but no transport is provided. There are Public Libraries at Wells and Fakenham, and a mobile library visits the village once a month.
